meanings.definition: A million units of a particular metric
meanings.sent1: The company produced several megs of data for the research project.
meanings.sent2: The hard drive has a capacity of several megs, enough to store all the photos.
meanings.sent3: She carried a meg of groceries in one trip, impressing her friends.
meanings.sent4: The lake stretched out before them, a meg of shimmering blue water.
meanings.sent5: The field was covered in a meg of colorful flowers, creating a stunning sight.

meanings.definition: A unit of information equal to one million bits
meanings.sent1: The video file was so large, it took up several megs of storage space.
meanings.sent2: The internet speed was fast, allowing the download of multiple megs in seconds.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly claimed to have a meg of knowledge stored in his brain.
meanings.sent4: The digital library contained a meg of books, accessible with a click.
meanings.sent5: The memory card could hold a meg of photos, perfect for the trip.

meanings.definition: A large, powerful, or influential woman
meanings.sent1: The CEO was a meg in the business world, making bold decisions.
meanings.sent2: She was known as a meg in the political arena, leading with confidence.
meanings.sent3: The superheroine was a meg, saving the city from disaster.
meanings.sent4: Her presence in the room was like a meg, commanding attention effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The queen was a meg of grace and elegance, admired by all.
